Fits well, comfortable. Bought a 2nd one.
Nice long sleeve shirt , semi thick , very comfortable

This shirt stretches out fast.
Fits great, looks nice. Sizing was accurate.
The fit was perfect. The material was strong & sturdy I washed before I wore them and it held up great
Size was spot on
Buen material y talla se ajusta a la realidad
Fast shipping excellent quality
I have other items from the Chaps line. Nice looking, right sized and fit 6', 178# L. So comfortable. Hope this helps someone. Would buy another one, or two. Wear every day in Winter.
I wear an XXL size shirt.  This shirt is so short I couldn't tuck it in.  It barely covers the belt.  This shirt needs to be at least 6 to 8 inches longer.  It is unwearable as is.
Good looking shirts and a decent price. Initial quality appears good. Fit as expected
Fits nicely on my son but he says it’s a little on the thin side. Would buy again.

Looks warm.. nicer looking than in the picture. True to size. Great price

This is a very nice thermal shirt!  Fits true to size.
You'll stay toasty warm in this sweater all day. This works well for the courtesy clerk role that I use it for at work. This sweater's material is so beautiful. Excellent work.

评论概述: Too thick for what I wanted
评论详情: Too thick for what I wanted.  More of a sweater.  Ended up returning it.
Comfortable and looks great, sorry it doesn’t come in black😕

I got this shirt as a pajama shirt. I loved the waffle knit design for these shirts. It keeps me warm at night and it looks good. I am a fan of the color as well, but that is just my bias. If you are looking for a shirt that offers comfort, warmth, and style then this shirt is for you.

I live in thermals during the winter. These all look and feel great. The problem is the inconsistencies from one shirt to another. Some are very short and dont go below my waist and this is before washing. I'm 5'8" and thin, so if you are my size or taller I would find another option. If you find it let me know!

I wear a lot of thermal shirts in the winter. Most of the are FOTL or Redhead. This high-quality thermal material is almost the same as the Redhead brand from bass pro and just as warm, almost hot. I am 5'8" and weight around 180 lbs. I got the large and it fits perfectly. It did shrink in total length but not too much.

评论概述: A little short for my liking
评论详情: I’m 6’1” and slim built. I usually get a large shirt and the length works well. This fits in the sleeves but is short in the torso length. The material is great and it looks good but the fit is just a little off for me.
This shirt is so nice! It's a well constructed, comfortable thermal shirt. It fits true to size and could be worn under a sweater in very cold weather or alone in moderately breezy weather.

This shirt is very soft, well made and very comfortable. A large shirt us normally a tic snug on me, but this one is a little larger than normal. That's great so I could wear a layer underneath if I wanted. I'm very happy with this shirt.
Work great for cold mornings

评论概述: Sweet Shirt, Nice Waffle Weave, Run Large
评论详情: I love the quality of the waffle weave. The stitching and crew neck are excellent. There are ribbed cuffs and hem. This is a quality shirt. It is 60% cotton and 40% polyester. I ordered a large one, which is way too big for me. I would order a size down. All is not lost because this will make a great Christmas gift for a friend who it will fit. It's a nice shirt and made well.

评论概述: A nicely made, overall nice shirt
评论详情: This is a nice shirt and what you'd expect from Chaps brand.  It's soft, well made, and a really nice color (I ordered the Northern Lights, which, frankly, I thought were green-ish in the sky but the shirt is blue.  Go figure.)  Nevertheless, a nice shade of blue.  Fits as it should (my son wears it) and it seems it will last a long time.
I ordered this product in exchange for a larger one received some time ago.  This it is very thin and rough to the touch.  There are no similar products😪.Total disappointed for my husband gift.
